expected.answer: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is the simulation of human intelligence by machines that are programmed to think and learn like humans. It encompasses a wide range of technologies and approaches, from rule-based expert systems to modern machine learning and deep learning. AI systems can perform tasks such as visual perception, speech recognition, decision-making, and language translation, often at levels comparable to or exceeding human capabilities.
facts: Includes machine learning and deep learning
Can perform complex tasks like pattern recognition
Used in various applications from healthcare to finance
Continues to evolve with new algorithms and approaches
